title: ColombiAPI: Access Colombian Data via APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ColombiAPI package provides comprehensive interface access diverse public data Colombia multiple APIs curated datasets. package integrates four different APIs: API-Colombia Colombian-specific data including geography, culture, tourism, government information; World Bank API economic demographic indicators; Nager.Date API public holidays; REST Countries API general country information. allows users retrieve --date historical information topics geographic locations, cultural attractions, economic indicators, demographic data, public holidays. addition API-access functions, package includes curated datasets covering wide range topics, including Bogota air stations, business holiday dates, public schools, Colombian coffee exports, cannabis licenses, Medellin rainfall, malls Bogota, indigenous languages, student admissions school statistics, forest liana mortality, municipal regional data, connectivity digital infrastructure, program graduates, vehicle counts, international visitors, GDP projections. datasets provide rich multifaceted view Colombian social, economic, environmental, technological information. ColombiAPI designed support users working data related Colombia integrating international RESTful APIs Colombian-specific APIs structured, reliable datasets public, academic, government sources single, easy--use R package.

title: ColombiAPI: Access Colombian Data via APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ColombiAPI package provides several core functions access real-time historical information Colombia public APIs API-Colombia, World Bank API, Nager.Date, REST Countries API. list main functions included package: get_colombia_airports(): Get Colombia’s Airports API Colombia. get_colombia_attractions(): Get Touristic Attractions Colombia API Colombia. get_colombia_child_mortality(): Get Colombia’s -5 Mortality Rate World Bank. get_colombia_cities(): Get Cities Colombia API Colombia. get_colombia_cpi(): Get Colombia’s Consumer Price Index (2010 = 100) World Bank. get_colombia_departments(): Get Colombia’s Departments API Colombia. get_colombia_energy_use(): Get Colombia’s Energy Use (kg oil equivalent per capita) World Bank. get_colombia_gdp function(): Get Colombia’s GDP (current US$) World Bank. get_colombia_holidays(): Get official public holidays Colombia given year, e.g., get_colombia_holidays(2025). get_colombia_hospital_beds(): Get Colombia’s Hospital Beds (per 1,000 people) World Bank. get_colombia_invasive_species(): Get Invasive Species Colombia API Colombia. get_colombia_life_expectancy(): Get Colombia’s Life Expectancy Birth (Total, Years) World Bank. get_colombia_literacy_rate(): Get Colombia’s Adult Literacy Rate World Bank. get_colombia_native_communities(): Get Native Communities Colombia API Colombia. get_colombia_natural_areas(): Get Natural Areas Colombia API Colombia. get_colombia_population(): Get Colombia’s Total Population World Bank. get_colombia_presidents(): Get Colombia’s Presidents API Colombia. get_colombia_radios(): Get Radios Colombia API Colombia. get_colombia_regions(): Get Colombia’s Regions API Colombia. get_colombia_typical_dishes(): Get Typical Dishes Colombia API Colombia. get_colombia_unemployment(): Get Colombia’s Unemployment Rate (Total) World Bank. get_country_info_co(): Get Country Information Colombia restcountries. view_datasets_ColombiAPI(): View available curated datasets included ColombiAPI. functions allow users access high-quality structured information Colombia, can combined tools like dplyr ggplot2 support wide range data analysis, visualization, research tasks. following sections, ’ll find examples work ColombiAPI practical scenarios.

title: ColombiAPI: Access Colombian Data via APIs and Curated Datasets
text: ColombiAPI package provides comprehensive powerful interface accessing real-time data public APIs wide range curated datasets Colombia. integrating multiple data sources — including API-Colombia Colombian-specific data geography, culture, tourism, government information; World Bank API economic demographic indicators; Nager.Date API public holidays; REST Countries API general country information — package allows users explore Colombia multiple perspectives structured consistent way. addition API-driven data, ColombiAPI offers preloaded curated datasets covering diverse topics Bogota air stations, business holiday dates, public schools, Colombian coffee exports, cannabis licenses, Medellin rainfall, malls Bogota, indigenous languages, student admissions school statistics, forest liana mortality, municipal regional data, connectivity digital infrastructure, program graduates, vehicle counts, international visitors, GDP projections. dual approach combining live API data curated datasets empowers users analyze Colombia’s social, economic, environmental, technological, cultural landscape greater depth. Designed support reproducible research, education, policy analysis, data journalism, ColombiAPI makes possible seamlessly integrate Colombian data R ecosystem, ensuring accessibility, reliability, clarity wide range applications.
